channel.title: 数据结构 on Kevin wang's blog
channel.description: Recent content in 数据结构 on Kevin wang's blog

item.title: java数据结构
item.description: 1. CollectionsFramework concept A collection is an object that represents a group of objects (such as the classic Vector class). A collections framework is a unified architecture for representing and manipulating collections, enabling collections to be manipulated independently of implementation details. 1.1 Collection interfaces java.util.collection java.util.Set java.util.SortedSet java.util.NavigableSet java.util.Queue java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue java.util.concurrent.TransferQueue java.util.Deque java.util.concurrent.BlockingDeque java.util.map and offspring java.util.SortedMap java.util.NavigableMap java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentNavigableMap 1.2 Collection implementations Interface Hash Table Resizable Balanced Tree Linked List Hash Table + Linked List List ArrayList LinkedList Deque ArrayDeque LinkedList Map HashMap TreeMap LinkedHashMap ArrayList
